AVS Format
[AV System (AVS)]

  AVS_FMT_TRANSPARENT, AVS_FMT_AES_MASTER, AVS_FMT_AES_MASTER_BSYNC, AVS_FMT_AES_SLAVE,
  AVS_FMT_DVD_24BITS, AVS_FMT_LABEL
}
 AVS Formats. More...

Functions

HRESULT avsFmtConfig (uint32 plugID, BOOL bTx, uint8 channel, AVS_FORMATS avsFormat)
 Set transmitter or receiver format for plug.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum AVS_FORMATS
 

AVS Formats.

Enumeration values:
AVS_FMT_TRANSPARENT  Set transparent mode all data from router to out.
AVS_FMT_AES_MASTER  IEC60958 mode and set transmitter in master mode.
AVS_FMT_AES_MASTER_BSYNC  IEC60958 mode and set tx in master mode, block sync from clock ctrl.
AVS_FMT_AES_SLAVE  IEC60958 mode and set transmitter in slave mode.
AVS_FMT_DVD_24BITS  Multi-bit linear audio 24 bits data of 6 channels.
AVS_FMT_LABEL  Using labels defined in memory to set for transmitter.

Function Documentation

HRESULT avsFmtConfig (  uint32  plugID,
BOOL  bTx,
uint8  channel,
AVS_FORMATS  avsFormat
) 
 

Set transmitter or receiver format for plug.

See also:
AVS_FORMATS
Set transmitter or receiver block sync format. Calls all needed formatting and avs procedures to set the default format channel specified for block sync.
Parameters:
plugID The ID of the plug (Tx:1-2, Rx:1-4).
bTx True if a Tx plug.
channel The channel
See also:
AVS_CHANNELS
Parameters:
avsFormat The format to use.
Returns:
NO_ERROR(0) or an error code.
